alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:24PM CDT until July 02 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN DICKSON...SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...EASTERN HOUSTON AND NORTHEASTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of McEwen, or 8 miles southeast of Erin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Erin, McEwen, Charlotte, Vanleer, Slayden and Cunningham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
